definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: LanShi DE family together to Yangs marriage.
sentences.chinese: 蓝仕德家人一同去杨家提亲。

sentences.english: A shower of plasma followed by a shower of glass from exploding light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 电灯泡爆炸后，与玻璃碎渣一同四溅的是等离子体。

sentences.english: Fidel looked at monica and Dan, photographs, together with anger.
sentences.chinese: 菲德尔看着莫尼卡和丹特在一同的照片，怒火中烧。

sentences.english: The children should be allowed to go to the movies with friends on Friday nights.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们该当被容许星期五早晨和冤家们一同去看影戏。

sentences.english: And when the head of a household is baptized, the rest of the household is to be baptized.
sentences.chinese: 当一家之长受洗，属乎他的人也当一同受洗。

sentences.english: She had many friends in Palo Alto and loved having fun.
sentences.chinese: 她在帕洛阿图市有很多朋友，喜欢一同游乐。

sentences.english: Chinese people usually get together for a big dinner.
sentences.chinese: 中国人凡是聚在一同吃年夜餐。

sentences.english: Welcome interested in medical image Programming prawns you have exchanges together.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎有志于医学图像编程的各位大虾们一同交流。

sentences.english: You and your servant there shall dine with me, and we shall further discuss.
sentences.chinese: 你和你的仆人与我一同用膳，我们继续探讨这个问题。

sentences.english: When their future is confronted with love, which one is more important?
sentences.chinese: 当前程与爱情一同遭遇未来，该怎样弃取？

sentences.english: Noah walked with me toward Rose’s quarters.
sentences.chinese: 诺亚陪我一同朝罗丝的住处走去。

sentences.english: Determine the relationship Qiang shen and qin day together very happy.
sentences.chinese: 确定了关系的沈蔷和秦天在一同很高兴。

sentences.english: If someone was donating money, Bhagavan would spend hours with that person.
sentences.chinese: 假如有人捐了钱，巴关会花几个小时与那团体在一同。

sentences.english: He inhabited the old hut at the end of the garden, in company with Fauchelevent.
sentences.chinese: 他和老割风一同住在园底的破房子里。

sentences.english: The mall was opened along with the Venetian Hotel in 1999.
sentences.chinese: 购物中心于1999年与威尼斯人酒店一同开业。

sentences.english: And the Holy Spirit indwelling the saints co-operates with Christ in this blessed work.
sentences.chinese: 圣徒里面内住的圣灵与基督一同执行这件神圣的工作。

definition: to carry/to take along/to bring along/to hold (hands)/also pr. [xi1]
to agree (on a meeting place, date etc)/to reach agreement/to make an appointment
to leave for/to proceed towards/to go
person of the same profession/of the same trade, occupation or industry
to go with sb/to form companionships
hand in hand/to join hands/to collaborate
